title: Can not answer incoming calls of already using apps, email etc on phone
content: I am new to Android from iOS. Anytime I recieve a call while using apps, surfing web, checking email or anything on phone, it will ring but I can not pull up of find who is calling, how to answer or decline.  It does not automatiy go to a phone screen like on iOS.  If wearing Bluetooth I can just answer but I have no clue who onam talking too. Help!
